ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] 7th Coldain Prayer Shawl
ygData.msgSnippet: Hm, I hadn t thought of doing that. I ve got a friend with a high lvl necro, might see if he ll give me a hand with it after the holidays. ... ===== ~~~~~~~~~
ygData.messageBody:
Hm, I hadn't thought of doing that. I've got a friend
with a high lvl necro, might see if he'll give me a
hand with it after the holidays.


--- Su <suceress@...> wrote:
> Yeah. I think the whole Death Squad triggering thing
> is kindof stupid. It
> shouldn't be that difficult to find Tanik. I had
> help from a high level
> necro. He used his pet to find the location of the
> guy and upon making sure
> it wasn't the Death Squad, he brought me over to do
> the hand in.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > Yeah, the 4th shawl is the death squad. I get so
> tired
> > of wandering around, hoping to trip over that
> dwarf,
> > lol.
> >
> > Snow griffin eggs are the last part of the 3rd
> shawl.
> > Also boring, but at least you're killing stuff. :)
> >
>
>
